reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater dress cute. However, the fit receives mixed feedback, with several customers noting it runs short for long torsos. The quality also gets mixed reviews, with some praising its craftsmanship while one customer describes it as low quality.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering for Tall Women!
items.body: I LOVE this dress! Wore it for fall photos. Very flattering on my 5’9” apple shaped frame. I am considering buying another. Great choice for a date night! It’s too short to wear to work on its own, but the sweater has a roomy fit and would look great with a pair of leggings. Read more
items.author: Andrea

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute top
items.body: Fabric is durable Well fitted from top Length a bit short for long torso Overall would buy again Read more
items.author: Joya

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Color is great
items.body: So cute and fits good Read more
items.author: Emily C

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Layer this! Cute, comfey and cuddly
items.body: Ooh la la! Wanna be warm and fashionable? Get this cozy, oversized cable sweater that is so toasty warm and a beautiful fashion statement! I am a larger, full bodied woman (5'8", 170 currently and body curvy with a slight mommy pouch). I ordered an XL, but I honestly could have gotten away with ordering a L in this. The sweater is not form fitting but meant to be a cuddly, fall/winter warmth piece. It's great to wear with the fashionable new slip skirt and boots or over some cute leggings for the perfect outfit! The versatility in dressing this up or down is great! It allows you to decide how dressy or relaxed your look is. The heavy gauge makes it quite warm and it looks like you paid a decent amount for it. It's nice quality and rather soft for a sweater of this caliber. This is going to be a staple for me this season. Add it to your wardrobe today! Read more
items.author: Just Nise

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Just ok
items.body: It’s ok. Definitely only one season. Read more
items.author: Deana Virgilio

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best quality and fit
items.body: Best dress ever! Bought for my sister and she absolutely loved the material and fit. Excellent quality! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Skip it
items.body: Wayyyyy too oversized. Itchy material. Would not wash well. Low quality as it arrived with a giant hole in the side. Read more
items.author: Ms Meg

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks cute with tights, leggings and skinny jeans!
items.body: Fits exactly as description. Read more
items.author: Michelle

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, A-khaki, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
